response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product go to someone who appreciates its true worth and will cherish it as much as I have. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
